bibl.title: POxy II 210 as an Apocryphal Gospel and the Development of Egyptian Christianity.
bibl.note: Re-edition of P. Oxy. II, 210 (= van Haelst 1151). Attempts an analysis of its relationship to the New Testament, exploring the implications this may have for reconstructing Egyptian Christianity.

bibl.title: Atti del XXII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. Firenze, 23-29 agosto 1998. Volume II

bibl.seg: PORTER Stanley E., POxy II 210 as an Apocryphal Gospel and the Development of Egyptian Christianity.

Isabella ANDORLINI, Guido BASTIANINI, Manfredo MANFREDI e Giovanna MENCI (a cura di), Atti del XXII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. Firenze, 23-29 agosto 1998. Volume II (Firenze, 2001) pp. 1095-1108.
Re-edition of P. Oxy. II, 210 (= van Haelst 1151). Attempts an analysis of its relationship to the New Testament, exploring the implications this may have for reconstructing Egyptian Christianity.
